
```{r Cleaning My Data}
clean_hibdata <- my_data |> 
  clean_names() |> 
  select(day, time, scouting, finals_week, week, outlet, shared_table, duration, floor_level) |> 
  rename(exam_week = finals_week,
         shared = shared_table,
         floor = floor_level)

```
